acceptance

Class AcceptanceReach

  • java.lang.Object
    • acceptance.AcceptanceReach
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AcceptanceOmega, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class AcceptanceReach
extends java.lang.Object
implements AcceptanceOmega
    A reachability acceptance condition (based on BitSet state sets). The acceptance is defined via a set of goal states and has to be "upward-closed", i.e., once a goal state has been reached, all successor states are goal states as well.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface acceptance.AcceptanceOmega

        AcceptanceOmega.LiftBitSet

      • complementToRabin

        public AcceptanceRabin complementToRabin(int numStates)
        Get a Rabin acceptance condition that is the complement of this condition, i.e., any word that is accepted by this condition is rejected by the returned Rabin condition.
        Relies on the fact that once the goal states have been reached, all subsequent states are goal states.
        Parameters:
        numStates - the number of states in the underlying model / automaton (needed for complementing BitSets)
        Returns:
        the complement Rabin acceptance condition

      • complementToStreett

        public AcceptanceStreett complementToStreett(int numStates)
        Get a Streett acceptance condition that is the complement of this condition, i.e., any word that is accepted by this condition is rejected by the returned Streett condition.
        Relies on the fact that once the goal states have been reached, all subsequent states are goal states.
        Parameters:
        numStates - the number of states in the underlying model / automaton (needed for complementing BitSets)
        Returns:
        the complement Streett acceptance condition

      • lift

        public void lift(AcceptanceOmega.LiftBitSet lifter)
        Description copied from interface: AcceptanceOmega
        Lift the state sets in the acceptance condition. For each state set states in the condition, lifter.lift(states) is called and the state set is replaced by the result.
        Specified by:
        lift in interface AcceptanceOmega
